createVaultSite(string,string,string,str.details: The API may auto-generate vaultSiteId; on-chain we require a non-empty,      unique identifier to be passed in. All arguments are minimally validated      for presence and basic format. Member must be ACTIVE in MemberRegistry.

params.city: City where the vault site is located.
params.insurerName: Name of the insurer providing coverage.
params.maximumWeightInGoldKg: Maximum designed gold capacity in kilograms.
params.memberGIC: GIC of the operating member (must be ACTIVE).
params.numberOfVaults: Design number of individual vaults in this site.
params.openingHours: Informational opening hours text (may be empty).
params.operationalAddress: Operational address (may differ or be empty).
params.registeredAddress: Legal registered address of the facility.
params.vaultSiteId: Unique identifier for the vault site (e.g. "VSZH0001").
params.vaultSiteName: Human-readable name of the vault site.

returns.success: Always true if the call does not revert.

getVaultSiteIds().details: Intended for off-chain enumeration and indexing.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns.exists: True if the site is registered.

createVaultSite(string,string,string,str.notice: Create a new vault site associated with an ACTIVE member.

getVaultSite(string).notice: Returns all stored details for a given vault site.

getVaultSiteIds().notice: Returns the list of all vault_site_ids known to the registry.

memberRegistry().notice: MemberRegistry used to validate roles and member status.

vaultSiteExistsView(string).notice: Checks whether a vault site with the given ID exists.
